company.about: Our mission is to help companies build lasting relationships with candidates and employees. We help teams clearly communicate compensation to candidates and employees through our digital offer and total rewards experiences, powered by our real-time comp and equity data. For people teams: We streamline offer creation and collaboration to run a more effective closing process, better convey total compensation through our digital offer experience, improve retention through our total rewards dashboard for employees, and integrate our real-time comp and equity data to make better offers and plan for the future of their organization. For candidates: We make it easy to understand their offer (digital and fully branded), which includes the role, total compensation, equity, benefits, perks, the team they’ll work with, and the culture of the company. For employees: We make it easy to visualize and understand their total rewards, including how their compensation, ownership, and financial relationship with the company grows and evolves over time.

jobOffers.description: Welcome is looking for US-based remote Senior Frontend Engineers (frontend or full-stack) to help us achieve our goal of making compensation fair and transparent across every industry. About Welcome Our mission is to help companies build lasting relationships with candidates and employees. We help teams clearly communicate compensation, better plan for the future of their organization, and level-set pay equity. We’re building a generational brand and platform for people teams, candidates, and employees to navigate all decisions about their teams, roles, and careers.
responsibilities: Write high-quality frontend applications in languages like Typescript and Javascript, using ReactJS
Create accessible, performant and well-tested React components, using tools like React Storybook
Design and consume modern GraphQL and REST APIs
Participate in the entire product creation process, including user interviews, design meetings, technical architecture decisions, and resulting implementation.
Work with other engineers to continually improve our process, tooling, monitoring, and instrumentation
jobOffers.notes: We can only consider US-based applicants at this time. All candidates must be authorized to work in the U.S. Candidates must be able to work EST/EDT hours.
